location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: coloured and black ink on paper.Dimensions: 203 x 326mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map showing the region of Sur in Oman. The map highlights the proposed fortified customs post referred to as A, and the proposed new customs house referred to as B. The map also highlights the areas where some of Sur's tribes are based. The map is prepared by Stuart Edwin Hedgcock, Minister of Finance to the Government of Muscat and Oman as part of a report.The scale is approximately 2 inches to 1 mile.
